name: The Null Factor
description:
Take on the forces of mind-controlled orcs and Mecha-wizards, as you battle your way to saving the planet.  A rogue AI named, V10L3T, is trying to create the perfect world, and you may be our last hope at survival.

Equip yourself with an arsenal of weapons and abilities as you fight your way to the top.  From rifles to grenade launchers, you're shoot to take em all down.
